alert.note: Alert for Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 1:18PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Flagler, northeastern Marion and southeastern Putnam Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 118 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Salt Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crescent City, Pomona Park, Salt Springs, Andalusia, Lake Delancy, Fruitland, Welaka, Lake Como and Georgetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Western Putnam
